title: Beans
description:
Beans, as used in cuisines around the world.  

May be used to talk about food, flatulence (caused by eating beans), or coffee beans.

Also used to discuss money, counting, or a small amount of something. 

May be used to refer to the head. Additionally may be used with phrases such as spill the beans, full of beans, or cool beans.
apple_vendor_description: The beans emoji on Apple devices presents a small cluster of kidney-shaped legumes, rendered with a smooth, slightly bumpy texture and a rich, earthy brown hue. Apple's design imbues these beans with a subtle 3D quality, as if they are softly rounded and catching light, suggesting nourishment, healthy eating, or perhaps a simple, humble meal.
